com.ihealth.communication.control

Class Hs5ControlForBt

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ihealth.communication.control.Hs5ControlForBt

  • public class Hs5ControlForBt
extends java.lang.Object
    Public API for the HS5 bluetooth

    The class provides methods to control HS5 device. You need to call the device method, and then call the connection method

    If you want to connect a HS5 device, you need to call iHealthDevicesManager#discoveryiHealthDevice to discovery a new HS5 device, and then call iHealthDevicesManager.connectDevice(java.lang.String, java.lang.String)to connect HS5 device.
